title: [Self-Directed] Academic Library Mobile App Utilization Strategies: Research-Based Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic information retrieval skills, mobile device operation proficiency, and familiarity with library systems
context.additional_context: A course for elementary education practitioners to master efficient smartphone-based academic information utilization, including VR simulation experiences of library app interfaces and real-world research scenario applications

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three key features of an academic library mobile app and design usage scenarios.
Learners can compare and analyze at least five mobile apps for research/educational purposes to create a recommendation list.
Learners can perform app-based information retrieval processes in a VR simulation environment with 90% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
